Terms of Use: By using the Chatty application, you agree to comply with the terms of use established by the developers. These terms include, but are not limited to, not using the application for illegal purposes, not sharing inappropriate content, and not harassing or disturbing other users. Privacy: Chatty respects your privacy and protects your personal data. The application uses your information solely for authentication purposes and to enhance your user experience. Your data will not be shared with third parties without your consent. User-generated Content: Users are responsible for any content generated by themselves in the Chatty application. The developers are not responsible for such content but reserve the right to take action in case of infringement of the terms of use. By clicking "Accept", you confirm that you have read and understood the terms and conditions of Chatty, and that you agree to comply with them in order to use the application.
